ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] not playing
ygData.msgSnippet: Just recently when they said we could re activate our old accts for free for a month I logged into my very first acct and the characters were still there after
ygData.messageBody:
Just recently when they said we could re activate our old accts for free for a month I logged into my very first acct and the characters were still there after 2 years of not playing it.
----- Original Message -----
From: Eric Sanford
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Sent: Thursday, May 29, 2003 12:39 AM
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] not playing

The official time is 3 months, but many people have said they left for
longer times and all the characters were still there.


----Original Message Follows----
From: Melanie Johnson <melanie_6602@...>
Reply-To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
To: EverQuest@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Re: [EverQuest] not playing
Date: Wed, 28 May 2003 06:28:01 -0700 (PDT)

I have quit playing on several different occasions, a
couple of times for 3 months, once for over 4 months.
I have always re-activated my account and all my
characters and items were just as I left them. I would
say that if you want to stop playing for the summer,
when you re-activate your account, all will be well.
:)

--- Kittin LovesYou <KittinLovesYou@...>
wrote:
> Quick question regarding the deleted char
> question.... if i cant play for a few months, stop
> payment on the account. How long is my char saved,
> is there a way to save it wehn I feel like coming
> back to play?  These next few months are filled with
> many things that will keep me away from home, lots
> of traveling, and I would rather nor waste the money
> when I could keep my chars in tact thru some means.
> Thanks.
>
>
